Question: Uniqconn Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Uniqconn Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Unveiling new line of ultra-thin laptops
- Features 15.6-inch 4K OLED display
- Equipped with 11th Gen Intel Core processors
- Integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics
- Ultra-slim design with all-metal chassis
- Long-lasting battery life
- Enhanced connectivity options including Thunderbolt 4 and Wi-Fi 6E
- Customizable RGB backlit keyboard
- Built-in fingerprint reader for added security
- Available in various configurations with up to 32GB RAM and 2TB SSD storage

Uniqconn Inc. showcases its latest CES 2024 highlight, an ultra-thin laptop series featuring 4K OLED display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, extended battery life, and advanced connectivity options, catering to users seeking both portability and performance.
Summary_cn:
Uniqconn Inc.

CES 2024 产品亮点

- 推出新一代超薄笔记本电脑
- 配备15.6英寸4K OLED显示屏
- 配备第11代Intel Core处理器
- 集成Intel Iris Xe图形处理器
- 超薄设计，全金属机身
- 长续航电池寿命
- 增强的连接选项，包括Thunderbolt 4和Wi-Fi 6E
- 可自定义的RGB背光键盘
- 内置指纹识别器，提供额外的安全性
- 提供不同配置，最高可达32GB RAM和2TB SSD存储

Uniqconn Inc. 展示了其最新的CES 2024亮点产品，这款超薄笔记本电脑系列配备了4K OLED显示屏、第11代Intel Core处理器、长续航电池寿命和先进的连接选项，满足了用户对便携性和性能的需求。
